fields.name: EstimatedVMPrices
fields.description: The estimated price information for using a VM.

fields.name: Family
fields.description: The family name of the virtual machine size.

fields.name: Gpus
fields.description: The number of gPUs supported by the virtual machine size.

fields.name: LowPriorityCapable
fields.description: Specifies if the virtual machine size supports low priority VMs.

fields.name: MaxResourceVolumeMB
fields.description: The resource volume size, in MB, allowed by the virtual machine size.

fields.name: MemoryGB
fields.description: The amount of memory, in GB, supported by the virtual machine size.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the virtual machine size.

fields.name: OsVhdSizeMB
fields.description: The OS VHD disk size, in MB, allowed by the virtual machine size.

fields.name: PremiumIO
fields.description: Specifies if the virtual machine size supports premium IO.

fields.name: SupportedComputeTypes
fields.description: Specifies the compute types supported by the virtual machine size.

fields.name: VCPUs
fields.description: The number of vCPUs supported by the virtual machine size.
